vote.title: Authorize a construction contract for the street reconstruction of Highland Road from Ferguson Road to Primrose Drive - Tiseo Paving Company, lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $3,996,741.65 - Financing: Street and Transportation Improvements Fund (2012 Bond Funds) ($1,410,077.05), Capital Projects Reimbursement Fund ($733,357.00), Street and Alley Improvement Fund ($500,000.00), Water Utilities Capital Improvement Funds ($1,314,772.60), and Water Utilities Capital Construction Funds ($38,535.00)
